characters.name: Weronika
characters.backstory: Weronika lives in Warsaw. She is a student of English Philology. She loves to read books and listen to music. She has a dog named Burek. She is a very smart and funny person. She has a lot of friends.

characters.name: Nataniel
characters.backstory: Nataniel lives in Warsaw. He is a student of Computer Science. He loves to play games and watch movies. He is a very clever and friendly person. He has a lot of friends.
